sqlMap.select: select s.storeunq, s.cateunq, s.storename, s.storeinfo, s.storerate, s.fee, m.menuunq, m.menuname, m.menukeyword, m.menuinfo, m.price from store s, menu m where s.storeunq=m.storeunq and m.storeunq = #storeunq#

SELECT storeunq, storename, storerate, decode(fee,0,'무료',fee) fee
from store s where storeunq = #storeunq#
